item.name: Command to Command and Escape
item.appendix: This one acts on both command keys.

item.name: Right Control to Hyper
item.appendix: This one acts on the right control key
which doesn't exist physically on mobile apple keyboards,
so use PCKeyboardHack to map anything you want to that key, eg caps lock).
Modifier use acts as if all modifiers (ctrl+option+cmd+shift) were pressed.
